ChargeEV

ChargeEV is a mobile app aimed to provide EV users with additional locations to charge their vehicles. This is achieved by allowing users to rent out their EV chargers to other users for a small fee.

Deck (IMS)

Inventory Management System (IMS) is a web app that automates the tracking of first aid stocks, and facilitates loaning and returning of items. Built with Django and deployed with Apache
